group_1.textCenter: Great work! You guys sure are practicing @hard today.

group_1.textLeft: Although I've finally gotten rid of the flatness @in my voice...
I still have a long way to go.

group_1.textRight: Yes, it's vital to always be sharpening your skills.

group_1.textLeft: ...Say, what's that you have there, Mayu?

group_1.textRight: Ooh, is that somen?
Yes, these are the bamboo dumplings and somen @that will be served at the festival!
I received them from those workers helping @with the food stall.
They asked if I could sample them on @their behalf.
Consider it a gift for everyone, since you're all @working so hard!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, the one that Manaka and Tsumugi are @assisting with.
I wonder if that green-haired gourmand is @devouring all the food as we speak...
Guh...!

group_1.textRight: Ria?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, Manaka...always present, even in my head...!
Since we did a lot today, let's take a break and @have something to eat!

group_1.textRight: Hooray! Yes, let's!
...Can you at least put down your script @while you're eating?
It's bad manners, you know.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry about that...@I'm just a little lost, though.

group_1.textRight: How so?

group_1.textLeft: I suppose it's because I'm still learning the @basics of acting...
But I'm not sure how to properly perform Tsuyu.
I don't think I understand her feelings...

group_1.textRight: You mean the part where she and Chizuru @hold hands after their battle?

group_1.textLeft: What...? How did you know?

group_1.textRight: I could tell by watching you.
You looked out of your element...or more like, @you didn't seem immersed in your role?

group_1.textLeft: ...I knew you'd understand.
Immediately after fighting, they take each @other's hands...
I just can't fathom that change of heart @for the life of me.
Since you're here, I'd really appreciate hearing @your take.

group_1.textRight: ...I think that would defeat the whole @point of it.

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: C'mon, Master, you need to refuel @your sugar stores!

group_1.textLeft: Homph?! Wha ar yoo..?!

group_1.textRight: We can't let you keep going on an @empty stomach!
Acting is its own kind of battle...
In that case, I can’t afford to lose!
I'm gonna eat lots of food! I gotta do my best!

group_1.textLeft: Woah! @You're going to make yourself sick, Sayuki!

group_1.textRight: Come on Master, you have to hurry up and@eat too, or it'll all be gone!
It's so delicious too! It'll be a shame if you @can't have any!

group_1.textLeft: I'm fully capable of eating it myself. @Don't shove it in my mouth!

group_1.textCenter: *Giggle* Manaka and the others will be happy @that so many folks enjoyed their food.
